Articles.Content:
25 minutes ago, Wolf Baginski said:

I vaguely recall Module Manager being a bit smarter about multiple copies than it seems to be now.

I was having issues with another mod (can't really remember now what was it) and I got the suggestion to revert to an older version of module manager. It did the trick, things really fell in together. Maybe that could help!

Trying to add this to my modded install, it hangs on loading SXT/Parts/Aviation/Engine/propEngines/eFan/SXTeFan

I tried deleting the MM cache files and also tried the previous version of SXT, neither worked.  

ksp log https://drive.google.com/open?id=10YMM44-qQYtZNzHL6lJfa6-xgCtfUnHN

output log https://drive.google.com/open?id=1jVfAcY0efoZlg6LvpFaEce6ZGl8DGwJc

6 hours ago, eberkain said:

Trying to add this to my modded install, it hangs on loading SXT/Parts/Aviation/Engine/propEngines/eFan/SXTeFan

I tried deleting the MM cache files and also tried the previous version of SXT, neither worked.  

ksp log https://drive.google.com/open?id=10YMM44-qQYtZNzHL6lJfa6-xgCtfUnHN

output log https://drive.google.com/open?id=1jVfAcY0efoZlg6LvpFaEce6ZGl8DGwJc

eFan requires the resource FScoolant from Firespitter, IIRC. Game will hang on load if it doesnt find it. If all you have installed is the firespitter.dll, you need the firespitter Resources folder as well.

Edited February 15, 2018 by theonegalen

On 2/15/2018 at 11:29 AM, theonegalen said:

eFan requires the resource FScoolant from Firespitter, IIRC. Game will hang on load if it doesnt find it. If all you have installed is the firespitter.dll, you need the firespitter Resources folder as well.

I've updated the OP about this

Based on some comments, I've made some further adjustments to both the mass and lift of the wings.  Please try it and let  me know how it goes:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/iz7i39564ueqybd/SXTContinued-0.3.22.zip?dl=0

Thanks

New release, 0.3.22:

  • Updated mass and lift for the wings to bring them more in line with stock

Hi, I tried to add this mod, but even though my KSP is 1.3.1 and i downloaded SXT for 1.3.1, KSP it says the version is unsupported and KSP crashes when loading ends. Does anyone know what might be the problem?

1 minute ago, Salvator said:

Hi, I tried to add this mod, but even though my KSP is 1.3.1 and i downloaded SXT for 1.3.1, KSP it says the version is unsupported and KSP crashes when loading ends. Does anyone know what might be the problem?

Log file, please

4 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Log file, please

Oh yeah, no need for that in the end. I'm just an idiot, the versions don't match after all, I'm really sorry for the bother. I should do these things tired after work...
What's the status for 1.4?
I have a question. Is there anyway to remove parts of this massive mod? Because I really only want the aeroplane parts and I don't need the spacecraft parts.

10 hours ago, jrf said:

I have a question. Is there anyway to remove parts of this massive mod? Because I really only want the aeroplane parts and I don't need the spacecraft parts.

Use The Janitor's Closet

20 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Use The Janitor's Closet

Thank you.

For those waiting on this for 1.4.1, it depends on Firespitter, which isn't yet available.

Please be patient, I believe that @RoverDude is nearly ready to release an update

Well, jeez, you've had, like, hours already.  What have you been doing, sleeping?   

 

Eagerly (and patiently) looking forward to it.

linuxgurugamer Thanks for all your talents in updating Mods. I have been running this SXT still with no issues on 1.4.1 till today. I know your still waiting on dependencies but when you get to his the Model 87 "Bazzard" Cockpit seems to have an issue with the kerbals going EVA. They seem to collide with it right away or go freaky spaghetti 

 

Log of colliding is : https://drive.google.com/open?id=111XdZyrQDViZ6GF3hSGgZp4S2uts-ICc. My guess is that the exit point needs to move out a bit.

Here is Erbie Kerman getting freaky spaghetti

I think so. Sounds right. That would be my guess too.

I'll extract it and check to see if that's what's up this weekend sometime.
If that's all it is, it should be quite simple to fix.

New release, 0.3.23.1

  • Thanks to forum user @Munar Industries, the Buzzard is fixed

Note that this is still a 1.3.1 release, dependencies haven't yet been updated for 1.4.1

Edited March 25, 2018 by linuxgurugamer
[snip] the flaps ALWAYS deploy up on one side and down on another, please fix this

2 hours ago, Modding Maniac said:

the flaps ALWAYS deploy up on one side and down on another, please fix this

 

whilst in the assembly building, right click on the flap that deploys in the incorrect direction, locate the invert button(or similarly labelled) and click it. now the flaps SHOULD deploy properly.

3 hours ago, RaiderMan said:

whilst in the assembly building, right click on the flap that deploys in the incorrect direction, locate the invert button(or similarly labelled) and click it. now the flaps SHOULD deploy properly.

holy excrements im an idiot, never once thought of trying that before

Please stop asking, nudging, subtle hints, etc. about 1.4.1
 

Edited March 26, 2018 by Dman979
Removed reference to deleted content.

Thanks for all the mods you manage to maintain and update LinuxGuruGamer, I've been a long time lurker and may have another account I have forgotten about, I've played (and modded) the game since March of 2013.  I want to say how much I appreciate the work you go to.

[snip]

Edited March 27, 2018 by Snark
Redacted by moderator

Hey there, wanted to report a bit of a bug in the 1.4.1 release (0.3.23.2)

Upon attempting to load the game, it gets partway through part patching, before hanging up.

On the loading screen, it says "SXT/Parts/Aviation/engine/PropEngines/eFan/SXTeFan"

In the KSP.log, the last entries are:

[LOG 04:11:39.819] PartLoader: Part 'SXT/Parts/Aviation/Engine/nuclearRamJet/NuclearRamJet/SXTnuclearramjet' has no database record. Creating.
[LOG 04:11:39.889] DragCubeSystem: Creating drag cubes for part 'SXTnuclearramjet'
[LOG 04:11:39.951] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'SXT/Parts/Aviation/Engine/propEngines/211D/SXTKO211Dprop'

here is a link to the full log file. : https://www.dropbox.com/s/ki6pkc21qr5urh8/KSP.log?dl=0

The normal output_log is blank

 

Edited March 27, 2018 by DracoSilverpath

1 hour ago, DracoSilverpath said:

Hey there, wanted to report a bit of a bug in the 1.4.1 release (0.3.23.2)

Upon attempting to load the game, it gets partway through part patching, before hanging up.

On the loading screen, it says "SXT/Parts/Aviation/engine/PropEngines/eFan/SXTeFan"

In the KSP.log, the last entries are:

This happens when you don't install the firespitter resources. Make sure they're installed. They are in the SXT download.
